mapper.select: SELECT B.MENU_NO AS MENU_NO , B.MENU_ORDR AS MENU_ORDR , B.MENU_NM AS MENU_NM , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS UPPER_MENU_ID , B.MENU_DC AS MENU_DC , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS RELATE_IMAGE_PATH , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS RELATE_IMAGE_NM , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM AS PROGRM_FILE_NM , (SELECT C.URL FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM) AS CHK_URL FROM COMTNMENUCREATDTLS A, COMTNMENUINFO B WHERE B.Menu_NO > 0 AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = 0 AND A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT C.AUTHOR_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS C WHERE C.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmpUniqId}) ORDER BY MENU_ORDR

SELECT B.MENU_NO AS MENU_NO , B.MENU_ORDR AS MENU_ORDR , B.MENU_NM AS MENU_NM , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS UPPER_MENU_ID , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS RELATE_IMAGE_PATH , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS RELATE_IMAGE_NM , (SELECT C.URL FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM) AS CHK_URL FROM COMTNMENUCREATDTLS A, COMTNMENUINFO B WHERE A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmpUniqId}) ORDER BY B.MENU_ORDR
SELECT URL FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = (SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE MENU_NO = #{menuNo})

select MIN(MENU_NO) from COMTNMENUINFO where UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo} and MENU_ORDR = (select MIN(MENU_ORDR) from COMTNMENUCREATDTLS A, COMTNMENUINFO B where A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tempValue}) AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo})

select count(MENU_NO) from COMTNMENUINFO where UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo} and MENU_ORDR = (select MIN(MENU_ORDR) from COMTNMENUCREATDTLS A, COMTNMENUINFO B where A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tempValue}) AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo})
